segments.text: It seems that you get antsy when you hear I praise another guy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get antsy not because you praise a guy , but because you may be taken for a ride by a guy like him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How come you think of him that way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because you seem to have lost your vigilance . You should be on the watch out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no reason to distrust him . He's never caused any harm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn't there anything that sounds fishy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing smells a rat . I told you that he's an all-right guy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All-right guy ? All right . Let's talk about something else instead .
segments.speaker: S2
